page.title: 09FARMLAND
page.content: The following information is all about the{farmland}in three 12 sq Km area which our group is covering.We have gone over the area and found out what is in each field.Our method of coding was done by giving each field a number and we went around identifying what was in each numbered field. Approximately 90% of the area was used agriculturally with only a small proportion used for livestock.The type of{crops}grown ranged from turnips to barley and the type of{livestock}kept ranged from chickens to horses.Not much of the land in the grid was disused and about 1Km of the 12Km was taken up by the airport runway and its surroundings.We found some of our information by giving the farmers a questionaire with the required questions on it.
